> <OLD>

> Rat Trap looks to her.
>
> "Wow, and you read this from an old=
 intel file somewhere..."
>
> She nodds.
>
> "Yep, that's right. And accord=
ing to Cybertronian lore, only the Autobots are capable of doing the powerl=
ink. Not the Decepticons or the predacons. I wonder if this holds true for =
the Maximals as well.. Imagine, if you guys could merge into one formidable=
 warrior.. Anyway, right now, it's more important that we fight fire with f=
ire. But it's like Tucson says. We can't force anyone into anything they do=
n't feel comfortable doing."

<NEW>

Rodimus shook his head slightly, "I am=
 not sure." He said, his optics
dim and thoughtful.

Lord Elder stepped up,=
 "I have seen those tapes you are refering to."
It was easy to see that the=
 older mech had had alot of time to devote
to study. "That was a long time =
ago." Elder said, "And the maximals
have been through so much since then."
=

Elder stepped into the middle of the group as he looked at each of
them, "=
There was a time when each of us stood taller than twenty feet
tall, some o=
f us thirty and more." Elder paused his optics dim with
memories. "However =
we have changed since then. We have slimmed down,
become more energy econom=
ical. many of us cannot form our larger sizes
any more."

Elder crossed his=
 arms and looked at Tuscon, "Some of you who are
still bulit like the Autob=
ots of old can still form somewhat larger
forms, but no where near as large=
 as you used to be." Elder shook his
head sorrowfully, "We became more ener=
gy efficient as time went on,
but certain things have also been lost."

Eld=
er shrugged as he looked at Tuscon and Rodimus, "I KNOW that the
Maximals c=
annot do it." Elder waved off with his had, "Yes I know
there are still a f=
ew combiners left like the Evil predacon
Tripredacus and Magnaboss, who San=
ton is a part of by the way, but I
don't think Powerlinking is still possib=
le."

Elder sounded pretty sure of himself as he spoke, his optics glinting=

meaningfully.

(TAG)

Preston
